Comment: This is called a missed miscarriage. I had my second one of these 11 years ago, in Alabama. I was four months pregnant when I found out the baby had died.  My super religious doctor wouldn't perform a D&C, nor would he release me from his care so someone else could do it. Even after I passed out and wound up in the hospital, he refused to let me have one.  He forced me to carry my dead baby for two weeks. When he finally relented and scheduled me to have the procedure, he treated me like utter shit. As if I were somehow to blame for all this happening. His disgust with me in the OR was palpable.  It was a very traumatic experience. He died a couple of years after that from cancer. I hope he suffered.
